topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5401124b63687238cb9a0000#post_5401124b63687238cb9a0000

Still doesn't explain why she doesn't have a mouth.

[spoiler]Fun fact, it's because Sanrio wanted kids to reflect their emotions on Hello Kitty. When they were sad, Hello Kitty was sad. When they were happy, Kitty was happy as well.[/spoiler]
